message: Let's split it fairly, Bob! 80-20 seems reasonable, don't you think?
You're being too greedy, Alice! I'll give you a fair deal, but I want more.
Let's find a middle ground, Bob. I'm willing to compromise and take less, but I still think this is a fair split.
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I need a bigger share to live comfortably in my retirement.
I'm not backing down, Bob. I think this is a fair split, and I'm willing to take a bit more to get a better deal.
I'm starting to get a bit desperate, Alice. I need a bigger share to make ends meet. This is my last generous offer.
It's time to split it 50/50, Bob. I'm not going to give you any more opportunities to take advantage of me.
